body: I think in tests we could check correctness of toString() return value and a request URL of the json() method.
I mean, can you give an example code which throws an exception because of the bug?

Gist.Smart.files() uses RtGist.json() method. So a code:

``` java
        Github github = new RtGithub(githubKey);
        Gists gists = github.gists();
        Gist gist = gists.get("8278781");
        Gist.Smart smartGist = new Gist.Smart(gist);
        Iterable<String> files = smartGist.files();
```

throws NullPointerException:

```
java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException
    at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
    at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:57)
    at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
    at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
    at org.codehaus.mojo.exec.ExecJavaMojo$1.run(ExecJavaMojo.java:297)
    at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:744)
Caused by: java.lang.NullPointerException
    at com.jcabi.github.Gist$Smart.files_aroundBody0(Gist.java:146)
    at com.jcabi.github.Gist$Smart$AjcClosure1.run(Gist.java:1)
    at org.aspectj.runtime.reflect.JoinPointImpl.proceed(JoinPointImpl.java:149)
    at com.jcabi.aspects.aj.MethodLogger.wrap(MethodLogger.java:204)
    at com.jcabi.aspects.aj.MethodLogger.ajc$inlineAccessMethod$com_jcabi_aspects_aj_MethodLogger$com_jcabi_aspects_aj_MethodLogger$wrap(MethodLogger.java:1)
    at com.jcabi.aspects.aj.MethodLogger.wrapClass(MethodLogger.java:132)
    at com.jcabi.github.Gist$Smart.files(Gist.java:145)
    at JcabiTest.main(JcabiTest.java:18)
```

I can't find a code where RtGist.toString() is used, so I can't reproduce the bug in it.
The budget of this task is **30 mins**. This is exactly how much time will be compensated, when the task is completed.
@carlosmiranda this ticket is yours now, please proceed, and keep in mind [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/intro). Any technical questions you should ask right here
@yegor256 sure! @asinyagin thanks for reporting, 15 mins was added to your account (trn ID: `DA2095425`)
Fixed! I also created unit tests to ensure that RtGist is performing a lookup in the right location. https://github.com/jcabi/jcabi-github/pull/187
Hi @asinyagin , are you satisfied with the fix for this issue? If so could you kindly close it already, otherwise please comment on what you think is incorrect or lacking. Thanks!
@carlosmiranda Much appreciated! **30 mins** was added to your account, payment ID `DA2103355`
